eventParts.text: Hey look, another group of birds! They look tough.
Well met, friends! Are you out on an adventure as well?
Yeah! Some vultures stole a bunch of seeds from our village and we’re trying to get them back.
I see! We’re out on a similar quest. Jennifer here had all the supplies in her shop stolen by the vultures, and we’re going to get them back.
Have you been journeying for long?

Oh yes, we’ve been out for weeks! It’s been quite the adventure. A lot has happened. I used to be a scholar, but now I think I want to be in law enforcement instead. You’d be surprised at how you might change!
Well, it was nice meeting you guys, I hope everything works out for you! Bye!
Rebecca, are you alright? You’ve been kinda quiet.
I don’t know. I’m not sure I want to change like that. I like being a merchant, and I think that’s what I want to do.

eventConsequence.selectionText: Hey, it’s okay. No one’s saying you have to change just because you go on an adventure. If you want to be a merchant, you can be a merchant.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah, alright. I’ll probably have to give it some more thought, but thank you!

Rebecca gains +3 confidence!

eventConsequence.selectionText: There’s nothing wrong with changing what you want to do with your life! It might seem scary now, but at the end of our adventure maybe you’ll feel differently.
eventConsequence.conclusionText:
Yeah. I guess we’ll see. 

Rebecca gains +3 caution!
